类 weka.datagenerators.DataGenerator
的使用

  • 使用DataGenerator的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    weka.datagenerators  
    weka.datagenerators.classifiers.classification  
    weka.datagenerators.classifiers.regression  
    weka.datagenerators.clusterers  
    weka.gui.explorer  

    • weka.datagenerators中DataGenerator的使用

      weka.datagenerators中DataGenerator的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClassificationGenerator
      Abstract class for data generators for classifiers.
      class  ClusterGenerator
      Abstract class for cluster data generators.
      class  RegressionGenerator
      Abstract class for data generators for regression classifiers.
      参数类型为DataGenerator的weka.datagenerators中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void DataGenerator.makeData(DataGenerator generator, String[] options)
      Calls the data generator.

    • weka.datagenerators.classifiers.classification中DataGenerator的使用

      weka.datagenerators.classifiers.classification中DataGenerator的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Agrawal
      Generates a people database and is based on the paper by Agrawal et al.
      class  BayesNet
      Generates random instances based on a Bayes network.
      class  LED24
      This generator produces data for a display with 7 LEDs.
      class  RandomRBF
      RandomRBF data is generated by first creating a random set of centers for each class.
      class  RDG1
      A data generator that produces data randomly by producing a decision list.

    • weka.datagenerators.classifiers.regression中DataGenerator的使用

      weka.datagenerators.classifiers.regression中DataGenerator的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Expression
      A data generator for generating y according to a given expression out of randomly generated x.
      class  MexicanHat
      A data generator for the simple 'Mexian Hat' function:
      y = sin|x| / |x|
      In addition to this simple function, the amplitude can be changed and gaussian noise can be added.

    • weka.datagenerators.clusterers中DataGenerator的使用

      weka.datagenerators.clusterers中DataGenerator的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BIRCHCluster
      Cluster data generator designed for the BIRCH System

      Dataset is generated with instances in K clusters.
      class  SubspaceCluster
      A data generator that produces data points in hyperrectangular subspace clusters.

    • weka.gui.explorer中DataGenerator的使用

      返回DataGenerator的weka.gui.explorer中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      DataGenerator DataGeneratorPanel.getGenerator()
      returns the currently selected DataGenerator
      参数类型为DataGenerator的weka.gui.explorer中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void DataGeneratorPanel.setGenerator(DataGenerator value)
      sets the generator to use initially
